CHAT_CHECK_EXIST.SQL: select * from chat where (user_id = ? AND friend_id = ?) OR (user_id = ? AND friend_id = ?)

CHAT_USER_DETAIL.SQL: select fos_user.*, chat_user_status.user_status as chat_user_status, cs.is_blocked as chat_block_status from fos_user left join chat_status cs on cs.chat_id = ? and user_id = fos_user.id inner join chat_user_status on chat_user_status.user_id = fos_user.id where fos_user.id = ?

CHAT_PAGGING_GET.SQL: select * from chat where user_id = ? OR friend_id = ? ORDER BY #sort_by# #sort_order# LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

CHAT_PAGGING_COUNT_GET.SQL: select count(*) as count from chat where user_id = ? OR friend_id = ?

CHAT_SEND_MESSAGE.SQL: INSERT INTO chat_message (chat_id, msg, attachment_url, attachment_type, sender_id, msg_status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

CHAT_UPDATE_LAST_MESSAGE.SQL: update chat set last_msg_at = now() where id = ?

CHAT_MESSAGE_GET.SQL: select * from chat_message where chat_id = ? and (msg_status != 4 OR (msg_status = 4 AND sender_id = ?)) and (delete_status = 0 OR (delete_status = 1 AND sender_id != ?) OR (delete_status = 2 AND sender_id = ?)) ORDER BY #sort_by# #sort_order# LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

CHAT_MESSAGE_COUNT_GET.SQL: select count(*) as count from chat_message where chat_id = ? and (msg_status != 4 OR (msg_status = 4 AND sender_id = ?)) and (delete_status = 0 OR (delete_status = 1 AND sender_id != ?) OR (delete_status = 2 AND sender_id = ?))

CHAT_MESSAGE_DELETE.SQL: update chat_message set delete_status = ?, modified_at = now() where id in (?)

CHAT_LIST_MESSAGE_SEARCH.SQL: SELECT chat.*, cm.* from chat INNER JOIN chat_message cm on cm.chat_id = chat.id AND (cm.delete_status = 0 OR cm.delete_status !=3) AND (cm.msg_status != 4 OR (cm.msg_status = 4 AND cm.sender_id = ?)) AND ((cm.sender_id = ? and cm.delete_status != 1) OR (cm.sender_id != ? AND cm.delete_status != 2)) WHERE cm.msg LIKE ? AND (chat.user_id = ? OR chat.friend_id = ?) GROUP BY chat.id ORDER BY cm.created_at desc;

CHAT_LIST_CONTACT_SEARCH.SQL: SELECT chat.*, fu.first_name, fu.last_name, fu.username, fu.cover_image, fu.profile_url, fu.id as master_user_friend_id from chat INNER JOIN fos_user fu ON (fu.id = chat.user_id OR fu.id = chat.friend_id) AND fu.id != ? WHERE (fu.first_name LIKE ? OR fu.last_name LIKE ?) AND (chat.user_id = ? OR chat.friend_id = ?) ORDER BY chat.created_at desc;

CHAT_LAST_MSG_GET.SQL: SELECT * from chat_message where chat_id = ? AND (msg_status != 4 OR (msg_status = 4 AND sender_id = ?)) AND (delete_status = 0 OR delete_status !=3) AND ((sender_id = ? and delete_status != 1) OR (sender_id != ? AND delete_status != 2)) order by id desc limit 1

CHAT_MESSAGE_STATUS_UPDATE.SQL: update chat_message set msg_status = ?, modified_at = now() where id in (?)

CHAT_MARK_AS_READ_UNREAD.SQL: update chat_status set is_unread = ? where chat_id = ? and user_id=?

CHAT_USER_STATUS_DETAIL.SQL: select * from chat_status where chat_id = ? and user_id != ?

CHAT_SENDER_STATUS_DETAIL.SQL: select * from chat_status where chat_id = ? and user_id = ?

CHAT_UNREAD_MSG_COUNT.SQL: select count(*) as unread_msg_count from chat_message where msg_status IN (1, 2) AND (delete_status = 0 OR delete_status !=3) AND ((sender_id = ? and delete_status != 1) OR (sender_id != ? AND delete_status != 2)) and chat_id = ? and sender_id != ?
